title: Bel Mondo
address: Calle de José Ortega y Gasset, Salamanca (near Metro Velázquez)
knownFor: Instagram-worthy decor, fun vibe, Italian cuisine
description: Vibrant 900m² Italian trattoria by Big Mamma Group. Mix of Lake Garda summer palazzo and cool 80s bachelor pad aesthetic. 300 seats across cozy corners, near fireplace for romantic dinners, or by open kitchen for larger groups. Authentic Neapolitan pizza and Italian dishes.
